name.en: Minimalist Hobo Shoulder Bag (Recycled Leather, Multi-Color)
name.zh: 极简腋下包/半月包（再生牛皮，多颜色）

description.en: A minimalist hobo-style shoulder bag with a clean silhouette and soft structure. Features a smooth top zipper opening and a roomy interior for daily essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for materials (including recycled leather), colorways, lining, zipper & hardware, logo, and packaging.
description.zh: 极简风腋下包/半月包，线条干净、软挺适中。顶部拉链开合，内部空间可放置日常随身物品。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：材质（可选再生牛皮）、配色、内里、拉链五金、Logo 与包装等。

en: Outer: Recycled leather / PU / genuine leather (customizable)
Logo: Debossed / woven label / metal plate (customizable)
zh: 面料：再生牛皮 / PU / 真皮（可定制）
内里：涤纶或超纤（可定制）
拉链：金属拉链（可选 YKK）
五金：金属合金（电镀颜色可定制）
Logo：压印 / 织标 / 金属牌（可定制）

en.Customization: Material, color, lining, logo, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 28–34cm × 高 18–24cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.可定制: 材质配色、内里、Logo、拉链五金、包装
